fn.p: Abbreviation: EQUIP = enhancing quality of life in patients.

How to cite this article: Li X, Qin K, Yuan C, Song S. The effect of enhancing quality of life in patients intervention for advanced lung cancer: protocol for a randomized clinical study. Medicine. 2020;99:51(e23682).
Funded by Qingdao Chengyang District Science and Technology Project (10-1-12-sh).
The authors have no conflicts of interest to disclose.
The datasets generated during and/or analyzed during the current study are publicly available.
HADS = Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale.
